name: Tea House Trouble
description:
Unleash your rhythm skills in “Tea House Trouble” - the pulse-pounding action-rhythm game where your timing is key to keeping the beat. Enjoy the serene ambiance in a traditional asian tea house in the daytime. Combat vicious spirits that attack the magical tea house at night.

Feature
  • Press the correct arrow  when the enemy reaches the glowing line.
  • Time your attack precisely to gain the most points.
  • Follow the Flow of the Music and enjoy the mystical setting.

  2. Follow the instructions 
  3. Open the game and enjoy
